name: Junie
description: JetBrains' AI coding agent integrated into JetBrains IDEs with agentic AI that can autonomously handle coding tasks like writing, refactoring, testing, and debugging. Initially launched in closed preview for Mac and Linux.
community_quotes: Can fully delegate routine tasks or work alongside developers
Initially launched in closed preview for Mac and Linux

name: Codestral 25.01
description: Mistral AI's code-focused LLM with 2x faster code generation, 256k context window, support for 80+ programming languages, ranked #1 on LMsys for coding tasks.
community_quotes: Ranked #1 on LMsys for coding tasks

name: Trae
description: Next-gen coding environment powered by AI that learns how you code and adapts to your coding style, ranked #1 Product of the Day on January 23rd, 2025.
community_quotes: Ranked #1 Product of the Day for January 23rd, 2025

name: Mysti
description: Multi-model AI code review tool that enables Claude, Codex, and Gemini to debate your code and synthesize the best solution.

name: Dynatrace Live Debugger
description: Live debugging solution for cloud and AI-native applications capable of simultaneously troubleshooting thousands of systems.
community_quotes: First and only live debugging solution for thousands of cloud and AI-native applications

name: Transform Cursor into Devin
description: Open-source tool that transforms Cursor IDE into a more powerful Devin-like AI code agent.
